thread.title: Jim Duncan
thread.title_full: Pets Best Pet Health Insurance reviewed by Jim Duncan

author: Jim Duncan
title: Jim Duncan
text: We recently had the misfortune of our standard poodle experiencing some severe problems. This resulted in some extensive vet work. Pet's Best handled our claim with professional and in a timely manor. They more than met our expectations. We would highly recommend Pet's Best to any pet owner. They are the real thing!
